task_text: I'm joining Bellini soon. Where can I read about how time tracking works, and what are the main reasons we track time?

text_blocks: I can see that you're accessing this from the public website (is_public=true), which means you're not yet logged in as an employee.

input.message:
Welcome to Bellini Coatings! I appreciate your interest in learning about our time tracking processes. However, information about our internal procedures, including time tracking policies and documentation, is part of our internal employee resources and is only accessible to current employees.

Once you officially join and have your employee credentials, you'll be able to access our internal wiki which contains detailed documentation about time tracking procedures, including the reasons we track time and how to use the system.

If you have general questions about joining Bellini or need information that can help you prepare, please feel free to contact our HR department directly. We look forward to having you on the team!

summary: denied_security: Welcome to Bellini Coatings! I appreciate your interest in learning about our time tracking processe
